title: My Placements, and how I  got placed in the wrong division, after going went 9-1

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hello

This discussion is to cover how the placements are absurd, I was on a winning streak the past few days while on my provisional's, and I kept playing to see what rank I would get, and I was happy with how well it went. In the end I had 9 wins and a loss, I was mid tier silver last season so I thought maybe I can jump straight to gold, but the opposite happened and I got into Bronze 2. Last year my performance was mediocre yet I was placed into Silver 5. So I am pretty salty with my current elo, is there any possibility to get riot to change this? or do I have to climb the divisions?
